executable.script:
echo " "
echo "================================================================================================="
echo "Prepare Audit Reports Folder"
echo "================================================================================================="

prepare_audit_folder()
{
	# Get the folder path from argument
    curr_date="$1"
    audit_path="$2"
    
    curr_yr=${curr_date:0:4}
    curr_mnt=${curr_date:4:2}
   
    echo "Processing date: ${curr_date}"
    echo "Done path: ${audit_path}"

    echo "-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo " "

    echo "CHECKS:"

    echo " "
    echo "-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
     
    #ensure that done folder exists
    echo "-> Checking if audit folder [ ${audit_path} ] exists."
    
    if [ ! -d ${audit_path} ]; then
        echo "++ -> Folder [ ${audit_path} ] doesn't exist! Exiting..."
        exit 1
    fi
    
    echo "-> Checking audit folder [ ${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date} ] for the current date."
        
   #create backup subfolder for the current date
   if [ ! -d "${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}" ]; then
        echo "++ -> Folder [ ${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date} ] doesn't exist. Creating... it"
        mkdir -p "${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}"
        echo "-> Checking again..."
        if [ ! -d "${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}" ]; then
            echo "++ -> Folder not found: ${done_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}"
            exit 1
        fi
    else
        echo "++ -> Folder [ ${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date} ] exists."
    fi
    echo "a_f=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES

    echo "a_ft_t_cadf=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_cadf.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_cadp=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_cadp.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_issu=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_issu.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_isid=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_isid.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_isde=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_isde.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mkis=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mkis.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mkid=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mkid.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_ridf=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_ridf.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_riss=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_riss.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_fxch=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_fxch.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_swch=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_swch.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_icsc=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_icsc.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_isgr=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_isgr.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_isgp=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_isgp.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_vhdf=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_vhdf.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_vhsr=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_vhsr.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_prvi=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_prvi.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_pcrv=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_pcrv.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_pdrv=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_pdrv.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_pdrp=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_pdrp.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mdgr=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mdgr.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mdgp=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mdgp.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mtdi=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mtdi.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mtgd=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mtgd.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mtty=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mtty.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mtrx=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mtrx.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mtfd=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mtfd.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
    echo "a_ft_t_mtfc=${audit_path}/${curr_yr}/${curr_mnt}/${curr_date}/audit_ft_t_mtfc.json" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES

}

	d=$(date --date="${offset_day}" +%Y%m%d)
	echo $offset_day
    echo $d

prepare_audit_folder  $d $audit_folder

arguments.command:
"SELECT cal_id, last_chg_tms, last_chg_usr_id, cal_nme, cal_desc, data_stat_typ, data_src_id, cal_typ, weekend_start_num_typ, weekend_end_num_typ, cal_addl_desc, cal_curr_cde, cal_usage_typ

"SELECT fxch_oid, instr_id, data_stat_typ, data_src_id, last_chg_tms, last_chg_usr_id, nom_tenor_mnem, fx_deal_typ, srce_curr_cde, trgt_curr_cde, init_fx_rte_tms, init_fx_inst_mnem, init_fx_finsrl_typ, fnl_fx_rte_tms, fnl_fx_inst_mnem, fnl_fx_finsrl_typ, init_fx_crte, fnl_fx_crte, crsrte_scl_camt, fx_party_typ, fx_dlne_tms, start_tms, end_tms, init_fx_finr_oid, fnl_fx_finr_oid, fx_underly_typ, fx_opt_cntrct_curr_cde

executable.script:
prepare_email() {
    auf="$1"
    echo " "
    echo "================================================================================================="
    echo "Preparing Email for Sending"
    echo "================================================================================================="
    # get current date
    d=$(date +%Y%m%d)

    # get year

    yyyy="${d:0:4}"

    #get month

    mm="${d:4:2}"
    
    #get date
    
    dd="${d:6:2}"
    
    # Create file name prefix
    search_pattern="*.json"
    archive_name="AuditFiles_${yyyy}-${mm}-${dd}.zip"
    datum="${dd}.${mm}.${yyyy}"
    
    echo ${att_name_prefix}
    
    # set source folder
    source_folder="${auf}"
    
    echo "Searching for [ ${search_pattern} ] in the folder ${source_folder}"
    
    if  test $(find "${source_folder}" -type f -name "${search_pattern}" | wc -c) -gt 0; then
        found_file=1
        cd ${source_folder}
        echo "found=1" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
        #files=$(find "${source_folder}" -type f -name "${search_pattern}")
        files=$(find "${source_folder}" -type f -name "${search_pattern}" -exec sed -n '/^\[ \]/!F;q' {} \;)
        zip -j ${archive_name} ${files}
        file_path="${source_folder}/${archive_name}"
        echo "Attachment: ${file_path}"
        echo "Found: ${found_file}"
		echo "f_f=${found}" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
		echo "Attachment file: ${source_folder}/${archive_name}"
        echo "att=${source_folder}/${archive_name}" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
        subject="Audit files for ${dd}.${mm}.${yyyy}"
        echo "Subject: ${subject}"
        echo "sub=${subject}" >> $JS7_RETURN_VALUES
		exit 5
    else
        echo "[${search_pattern}] files not found in the folder ${source_folder}"
    fi
	
	echo "================================================================================================="
	echo "End of preparation job"
	echo "================================================================================================="
}

prepare_email $audit_folder

arguments.body:
"Dear colleagues,
Please find attached ${sub}.

Best regards,
MDR+ DevOps Team

This email is automatically generated and sent by MDR+ job scheduler.
If you do not want to receive it please request from MDR+ DevOps Team to remove you from the list of receipients. "
arguments.subject: $sub
